moreAbout.title: My Journey in Tech
moreAbout.description1: I started my journey in tech in Argentina, working as a frontend developer for several companies. Over time, I gained experience in different roles and technologies, and eventually decided to take the leap and move to New Zealand.
moreAbout.description2: The transition wasn't easy, but it was worth it. I've worked with Kiwi companies both on-site and remotely, and I've learned a lot about the local tech industry, the job market, and what it takes to grow as an international developer in NZ.
moreAbout.description3: Now, I'm passionate about helping other Latin American developers make their transition smoother. Whether you're just starting in tech or thinking about moving to New Zealand, I'm here to share what I've learned and guide you through the process.

booking.title: Book a Free Consultation
booking.description: Let's discuss your career goals and how I can help you find the perfect opportunity in New Zealand's IT industry.

footer.description: Dev in NZ sharing what I wish I'd known when I started.
